amendment.description: Amendment encourages collaboration and sharing of best practices between charter schools and local education agencies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 21 printed in part B of House Report 114-29 to encourage collaboration and sharing of best practices between charter schools and local education agencies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Polis.
